name: 黃希敏
objective: 本科目旨在探討現實世界裡語言和溝通的種種現象，如：社會中之語言變化、大眾媒體的語言使用等，並介紹應用語言學門之緣起和現況。學生將需要分享自己對於本地或國際有關語言應用議題的觀察，例如：職場溝通模式、辨識性言詞分析、語言教學/測試趨勢、口筆翻譯項目、語言在新型媒體中之應用等。
schedule:
01	Introduction
02	Applied linguistics (A)
03	Applied linguistics (B)
04	Prescribing and describing: popular and academic views of ‘correctness’ (A)
05	Prescribing and describing: popular and academic views of ‘correctness’ (B)
06	Language in the contemporary world (A)
07	Language in the contemporary world (B)
08	English Language Teaching (ELT) (A)
09	English Language Teaching (ELT) (B)
10	Language and communication (A)
11	Language and communication (B)
12	Context and culture (A)
13	Context and culture (B)
14	Persuasion and poetics: rhetoric and resistance (A)
15	Persuasion and poetics: rhetoric and resistance (B)
16	Past, present, and future directions (A)
17	Past, present, and future directions (B) 
18	Final
scorePolicy:
1. Class participation (small-group discussion on issues related to the individual chapters of the textbook)  70%
2. Final  30%
3. Spontaneous Q & A: bonus credits
materials: Cook, G. (2010). Applied Linguistics. Oxford and New York: Oxford University Press
